topic: Impact of AI on energy consumption and cost savings
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that by identifying and challenging my core assumptions, I can uncover surprising insights that have the potential to transform my understanding. The next step is to conduct a deliberate review of my current beliefs and assumptions, particularly focusing on areas where I suspect hidden biases or unexamined influences. This process will involve seeking out diverse perspectives and engaging with information that contradicts my current viewpoints to foster meaningful growth and discovery.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
